adjective.description: Painted, printed, or decorated in several colors.

examples: Modigliani continued to carve his large heads, sometimes in polychrome, until 1916

verb.description: Execute or decorate (a work of art) in several colors.
examples: a polychromed bust of a young girl

origin: Early 19th century: from French, from Greek polukhrōmos, from polu- many + khrōma color.
